Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.epl

Processors to manipulate traces of generic events.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountDecimate
    Returns one input event and discards the next n-1.
    EplGrammar  
    Filter
    Discards events from an input trace based on a selection criterion.
    Freeze
    Repeatedly outputs the first event it has received.
    Insert
    Inserts an event a certain number of times before letting the input events through.
    Prefix
    Returns the first n input events and discards the following ones.
    QueueSink
    Sink that accumulates events into queues.
    QueueSource
    Source whose input is a queue of objects.
    QueueSourceBatch
    Operates like QueueSource, except that it dumps all its queue at once, instead of releasing the events one by one.
    Sink
    Receives input events and stores them.
    SinkLast
    Sink that remembers only the last event sent to it.
    Slicer
    Separates an input trace into different "slices".
    Source
    Produces output events from no input.
    TimeDecimate
    After returning an input event, discards all others for the next n seconds.
    Trim
    Discards the first n events of the input, and outputs the remaining ones.
    Window
    Simulates the application of a "sliding window" to a trace.

Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.epl Description

Processors to manipulate traces of generic events. This includes delaying, discarding, freezing, multiplexing and demultiplexing, and applying a sliding window, among other things.
Author:
Sylvain Hallé
